Career Profile

I am currently a senior at Texas Christian University, majoring in Computer Science and graduating in May 2023. I am interested in roles such as Software Engineering, Product Management, Tech Support, and Cloud Computing. I have previously interned at MD7 as a Software Engineer Intern. I am the Vice President of TCU Chapter of Upsilon Pi Epsilon and a member of National Society of Collegiate Scholars. My current cumulative GPA is 3.98 and major GPA is 4.0.

Experiences

Software Engineer Intern

01 2022 - 07 2022
MD7, Allen, TX
  • Collaborated with a team of software engineers to deliver features like release notes, bulk user edit etc for BA team and customers on web applications using ASP.net, C#. JavaScript, JQuery, HTML, CSS, and Rest API.
  • The Release Notes feature used an iframe to display the latest advancements the company has made as a pdf loaded from SharePoint. It also showed a notification on the hamburger menu depending on the last time the user viewed the release notes.
  • The Bulk User Edit feature was designed to be used by the admins to give roles and permissions, set of views they can have in the website, to multiple users at a time.

Team Lead

TCU, BMW Quarter Horses
  • Led a team of 4 developers to develop a one stop aggregated solution for reining horses with data such as name, sire, dam, 2nd dam, 2nd sire, maneuver scores etc.
  • Scraped data from websites using selenium and python requests; used Vue.js and Vuetify for frontend and Spring Boot for backend.
  • Implemented features such as search horses by muliple parameters, specific combination of fields, basic CRUD operations etc.
